00048     class Menu : public SyntaxNode
00049     {

00053             const std::string& STR_Name,    
00054             const Help& CLI_Help            
00055             );
00056

00059 
00060     public:
00062         virtual void SetCli(Cli& CLI_Cli);

00066         virtual const bool Execute(const CommandLine& CLI_CommandLine) const;
00068         virtual void OnExit(void) const;
00069 
00070     private:
00072         Keyword& GetHelpNode(void);
00074         const Keyword& GetHelpNode(void) const;
00076         Keyword& GetExitNode(void);
00078         const Keyword& GetExitNode(void) const;
00080         Keyword& GetQuitNode(void);
00082         const Keyword& GetQuitNode(void) const;

00087

00090         Keyword* m_pcliHelp;
